flawed_nl_solution:
If Phil had won 3 games more than did Charlie, and Phil won 12 games, then Charlie won 12-3=<<12-3=12>>12 games.
If Charlie had won 2 games fewer than Dana, and Charlie won 12 games, then Dana won 12+2=<<12+2=14>>14 games.
If Perry had won 5 more games than did Dana, and Dana won 14 games, then Perry won 14+5=<<14+5=19>>19 games.
Thus, Perry won 19-12=<<19-12=7>>7 more games than did Phil.
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
